text: @NYGovCuomo You know nothing about respect! If you did you wouldn’t have tossed #COVID19 sick elderly patients back into nursing homes to infect others then die alone! #DemocratsAreDestroyingAmerica #NursingHomeSlaughter #ShutUpAndObey
